title: Traits and Features
content: the Land Lvl 3 Grassland Druid Spell Circle Gain Invisibility, which turns a creature invisible, and Pass without Trace, which gives you and nearby companions a +10 to Stealth checks. Circle of the Land Lvl 3 Mountain Druid Spell Circle Gain Mirror Image, which improves your Armor Class, and Spike Growth, which transforms the ground and deals 1d4 Piercing damage to creatures walking on the spikes.
